name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptbook: Inline Prompt Manager for ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and access your prompts from ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension places a sliding window in the ChatGPT web interface which allows users to: 

- Create and manage prompts: Easily add, copy, and delete text prompts.
- Organize prompts in folders: Group and store prompts for structured organization.
- Include variables in their prompts: Use "{}" to denote a variable, which will be replaced with custom text when copying.
- Expand/collapse folders: Manage visibility of prompts within the interface.
- Export prompts: Transfer data via JSON files for sharing or backup. (Import functionality coming soon)
- Local storage integration: All data is stored locally.
